description: open toe sandals with lined black enclosed heel sides with floral embroidery in pink, green, beige; loop and knot button closure over instep; narrow embroidered straps over toes and instep; reinforced sole (paper and fabric?) with heavy cord stitching throughout
title: Pair of Shoes
